p: The use of convalescent plasma in the treatment of coronaviruses is not new. Convalescent plasma was studied in the treatment of SARS during the 2003 SARS-associated coronavirus 1 (SARS-CoV-1) outbreak originating in Hong Kong. Although the data are mainly limited to case reports [ [31], [32], [33]] and case series [ 34], there are several retrospective, non-randomized studies that offer more substance.
